'''Aha! What's on the Hook?''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To obtain this achievement, the player needs to complete the World Quest ''[[Cost-Effective Hook]]'', which is unlocked the day after the player completes the daily commission [[Supreme Hookshot?]] for the third time.
